Desc.eng: Welcome, Inquisitor! How may I be of service?
Inquisitor! I welcome you in the name of The Vigilants on our ship! I assume you have been made aware of our general purpose. I hope we can offer you aid in your sacred duty.
Iâ€™m here to acquire a service from you.

I am an emissary of The Vigilants. The humble seekers of lost truths as well as students of history. Our mandate includes the reclamation of technology and the expansion of Imperial authority. We also welcome any opportunity to share the fruits of our exploits with the agents of the Inquisition.
